body_html:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.random_normal([5, 5])
b = tf.random_normal([10, 10])
c = tf.matrix_band_part(input=b, num_lower=0, num_upper=tf.shape(a)[0])

The above code will cause a TypeError:

TypeError: Input 'num_upper' of 'MatrixBandPart' Op has type int32 that does not match type int64 of argument 'num_lower'.
body_text:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.random_normal([5, 5])
b = tf.random_normal([10, 10])
c = tf.matrix_band_part(input=b, num_lower=0, num_upper=tf.shape(a)[0])


The above code will cause a TypeError:

TypeError: Input 'num_upper' of 'MatrixBandPart' Op has type int32 that does not match type int64 of argument 'num_lower'.
body:
```
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.random_normal([5, 5])
b = tf.random_normal([10, 10])
c = tf.matrix_band_part(input=b, num_lower=0, num_upper=tf.shape(a)[0])

```
The above code will cause a TypeError:

> TypeError: Input 'num_upper' of 'MatrixBandPart' Op has type int32 that does not match type int64 of argument 'num_lower'.
